SYSTEM_MSG_1.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: there are [0-9]+ clusters'

SYSTEM_MSG_2.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

nClusters.content: Imagine the Great Pacific Mall with 15 stores. Starbucks is connected to Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Sephora. Pete's Coffee is connected to Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works. Chickflea is connected to Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Nike. Marshalls is connected to Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Target. Carter Children is connected to Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works. Baskins and Robins is connected to Levis, GNC Live Well, and Target. Paris Baguette is connected to H&M and Zara. Nike is connected to Bath and Body Works. Levis is connected to GNC Live Well and Target. H&M is connected to Zara. Sephora is connected to Bath and Body Works. GNC Live Well is connected to Target. How many densely-connected store clusters do we have in this mall? A densely-connected cluster is a group of stores that are connected to themselves with a max of 2 stores.

nClustersFloors.content: Imagine the Great Pacific Mall with 15 stores. On the first floor, Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, and Zara are all connected to each other. Marshalls, Paris Baguette, H&M, and Zara are connected to each other. Paris Baguette, H&M, and Zara are connected to each other. H&M is connected to room Zara.  On the second floor, Pete's Coffee, Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Carter Childer, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Nike is connected to Bath and Body Works. Sephora is connected to Bath and Body Works.  On the third floor, Chickflea, Baskins and Robbins, Levis, and GNC Live Well are all connected to each other. Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Target are connected to each other. Levis, GNC Live Well and Target are connected to each other. GNC Live Well is connected to Target.  There is a staircase that connects Starbucks on the first floor to Sephora on the second floor. There is another staircase that connects Nike on the second floor to Chickflea on the third floor. There is also a staircase that connects Target on the third floor to Marshalls on the first floor.  How many densely-connected room clusters do we have in this mall? A densely-connected cluster is a group of stores that are connected to themselves with a max of 2 stores.
